item.title: 本周二，16 个州和一个地区将举行提名竞赛，这标志着两党初选日程中的一个支点--也让这一天有了 "超级星期二 "的传统称谓：
item.description:
Sixteen states and one territory are holding nominating contests Tuesday, marking a fulcrum point in the two parties' primary calendars — and giving the day its traditional "Super Tuesday" moniker.

Here are five things to watch for: https://t.co/Y2PzWUsDiy

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 联合国称有 "明确 "证据表明以色列人质在加沙遭受性暴力。

item.title: 在举家准备出发去春游的时候，一段关于一名妇女在飞机上争夺窗帘的新视频引发了关于旅客舒适度和礼貌的新问题。
item.description:

item.title: 据消防官员称，在密歇根州，一名 19 岁的年轻人在距离隔夜爆炸现场四分之一英里的地方，被爆炸中飞向空中的一个罐子击中身亡。
item.description:
A 19-year-old who was a quarter mile away from a fiery overnight explosion in Michigan was struck and killed by a canister that flew into the air from the blast, according to fire officials. https://t.co/NQpnmzUB9E pic.twitter.com/DLIqs1fqlU

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 最近几个月，股市攀升，主要是受科技公司对人工智能热情的推动。然而，批评者警告说，人工智能的盈利用途仍是一个遥远的愿景，如果技术达不到预期目标，市场就会面临下滑的风险。
item.description:
The stock market has climbed in recent months, driven in large part by tech companies propelled by enthusiasm over AI.

Critics, however, warn that profit-making uses of AI remain a far-off vision, risking a market downturn if the technology falls short. https://t.co/mpbDVUY084 pic.twitter.com/20EYCXC5K9

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：据消防官员称，在密歇根州，一名 19 岁的年轻人在距离火光冲天的爆炸现场四分之一英里的地方，被爆炸中飞向空中的一个罐子击中身亡。
item.description:
JUST IN: A 19-year-old — who was a quarter mile away from a fiery explosion in Michigan — was struck and killed by a canister that flew into the air from the blast, according to fire officials. https://t.co/ZBxfKJcEpB

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 罕见的新镜头捕捉到了一头名叫索菲亚的 60 岁虎鲸祖母与大白鲨搏斗的画面，科学家们认为这是首次拍摄到一头虎鲸杀死一条大白鲨的画面。
item.description:
Rare new footage has captured a 60-year-old grandmother orca — named Sophia — battling with a great white shark in what scientists believe is the first time a single orca has ever been filmed killing a great white. https://t.co/q4kTmxWTMc pic.twitter.com/ST9oqF6MZd

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 威尔士王妃凯特自 1 月份接受腹部手术后首次公开露面。
item.description:
Kate, the Princess of Wales, has been spotted publicly for the first time since undergoing abdominal surgery in January. https://t.co/pANHllPRRs

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 根据法庭文件，在宾夕法尼亚州农村家中被杀害的阿米什孕妇被发现躺在血泊中，喉咙被割断。
item.description:

item.title: 最新消息：周一，武装团伙试图夺取海地主要国际机场的控制权，混乱和暴力继续笼罩着这个加勒比国家。
item.description:

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 乌克兰声称它已在黑海利用高科技海上无人机击沉了另一艘俄罗斯军舰，而基辅军队则继续瞄准战争前线纵深的目标。
item.description:
Ukraine claims it has sunk another Russian warship in the Black Sea using high-tech sea drones as Kyiv’s forces continue to take aim at targets deep behind the war’s front line. https://t.co/yThd5w7gmB pic.twitter.com/u7cDcQEMNJ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 1946年的这一天 温斯顿-丘吉尔发表了 "铁幕 "演说 他说："从波罗的海的斯德丁 到亚得里亚海的里雅斯特" "一道'铁幕'横跨欧洲大陆" "让警察政府统治东欧"
item.description:
On this day in 1946 Winston Churchill delivered his “Iron Curtain” speech, in which he said: “From Stettin in the Baltic, to Trieste in the Adriatic, an ‘iron curtain’ has descended across the continent, allowing police governments to rule Eastern Europe.” https://t.co/OYE0kFrN7Q pic.twitter.com/oMSiTo8Epu

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 菲律宾指责中国海岸警卫队进行 "危险演习"，导致在南海发生碰撞。
item.description:
The Philippines accused China's coast guard of carrying out "dangerous manoeuvres" that led to a collision in the South China Sea.

Beijing claims sovereignty over most of the South China Sea, a claim a court ruled has no legal basis. pic.twitter.com/usLdeRrHgP

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 詹姆斯-克兰伯里（James Crumbley）过失杀人罪的审判将于妻子在儿子校园枪击案中被判有罪数周后开始。
item.description:
James Crumbley's manslaughter trial to begin weeks after wife found guilty in son's school shooting. https://t.co/EvbjcCsMFu

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 消费者金融保护局（Consumer Financial Protection Bureau）周二敲定了一项规定，将信用卡的一般滞纳金从 32 美元降至 8 美元。
item.description:
The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau finalized a rule Tuesday that will cut the typical credit card late fee to $8 from $32. https://t.co/At0flyXn72

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 在洛杉矶清白项目接手被定罪的杀人犯斯科特-彼得森一案不到两个月后，加利福尼亚州圣马特奥县的一名法官安排了一次情况听证会。
item.description:

item.title: 在武装团伙袭击了这个加勒比国家最大的两所监狱并释放了数十名囚犯之后，海地进入了紧急状态并实行夜间宵禁，暴力事件激增。
item.description:
Haiti is under a state of emergency and nighttime curfew amid a surge of violence, after armed gangs attacked the Caribbean country's two largest prisons and freed scores of inmates. https://t.co/JskLTYa5zY

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 英国警方找回了近三十年前在意大利从奥地利一级方程式赛车手格哈德-伯杰（Gerhard Berger）那里失窃的一辆法拉利跑车。
item.description:
A very fast car has made a very slow return.

British police have recovered a Ferrari stolen from Austrian Formula One driver Gerhard Berger in Italy almost three decades ago. https://t.co/QcR3qvlaGO pic.twitter.com/12HtORWUgH

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 生日快乐查理和克雷格-里德（Charlie and Craig Reid），即 "I'm Gonna Be (500 Miles) "乐队（The Proclaimers）的主唱，今天 62 岁了。
item.description:
HAPPY BIRTHDAY: Charlie and Craig Reid, better known as "I'm Gonna Be (500 Miles)" singers The Proclaimers, are 62 today. https://t.co/doAjvcrRZJ pic.twitter.com/GpJBLqO96d

item.title: 2022 年，达米安-博斯切托偶然发现了一具距今 7000 万年的巨大化石，这竟然是一具几乎完整的长颈恐龙骨架。
item.description:
In 2022, Damien Boschetto stumbled upon a massive, 70 million-year-old fossil that turned out to be a nearly complete skeleton of a long-necked dinosaur.

And it all happened while he was walking his dog.https://t.co/q8mSE9pu1e pic.twitter.com/CPsETbXtfW

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 法国立法者周一在凡尔赛宫举行的历史性议会联席会议上批准了一项法案，将妇女堕胎的权利写入国家宪法。
item.description:
French lawmakers approved a bill on Monday that will enshrine a woman’s right to an abortion in the nation's constitution during a historic joint session of parliament at the Palace of Versailles. https://t.co/187AJFkbDN

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 本周末，本季最大的暴风雪袭击了加利福尼亚内华达山脉，一些地区的积雪超过了 10 英尺。据帕利塞德-太浩滑雪场报告，山顶的阵风达到 190 英里/小时。
item.description:
The biggest snowstorm of the season hit California’s Sierra Nevada mountains over the weekend, with some areas reporting more than 10 feet of snow. Palisades Tahoe ski resort reported a wind gust of 190 mph at the summit. pic.twitter.com/zdEowSOGBB

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: Opill 的母公司周一表示，首款无需处方即可购买的非处方避孕药 Opill 将于本月晚些时候在网上和药店发售。
item.description:
Opill, the first over-the-counter birth control pill that can be purchased without a prescription, will be available later this month online and in pharmacies, its parent company said Monday. https://t.co/6e30DAKmBj

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 据俄亥俄州警方称，周六，一名邮政工作人员在他的邮车上遭到 "有针对性的袭击"，不幸中弹身亡。
item.description:
A postal worker was in his mail van when he was fatally shot in a "targeted attack" on Saturday, according to police in Ohio. https://t.co/S5Zp43zk7U

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024
